name: Half-Orc
description: Half-Orcs combine the best qualities of both humans and orcs: the strength, stamina, and combat prowess of orcs with the adaptability and ambition of humans. They are known for their physical power, resilience, and a strong sense of independence. Many Half-Orcs live among orcs, but others choose to integrate into human society, where they are often respected for their battle prowess.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Orc.
special: Relentless Endurance: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. Once you use this trait, you canâ€™t use it again until you finish a long rest.
